meanings.definition: A wig or artificial hairpiece worn to cover a bald spot or for cosmetic purposes.
meanings.sent1: He wore a toupee to hide his bald spot.
meanings.sent2: The actors in the play all wore toupees to look different.
meanings.sent3: The toupee flew off in the wind, causing laughter among the crowd.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was like a toupee, covering her insecurities.
meanings.sent5: The toupee gleamed under the spotlight, drawing everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The shop displayed various toupees for sale.
meanings.sent2: They all decided to wear toupees to the costume party.
meanings.sent3: The toupees on the mannequins looked quite stylish.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered in toupees of different colors, like a garden of hair.
meanings.sent5: The toupees on the shelf seemed to whisper stories of their wearers.
